alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Jasper (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 21 at 8:16PM CDT until April 21 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL JASPER AND WEST CENTRAL CLARKE COUNTIES... At 814 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Turnerville, or 8 miles northeast of Bay Springs, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Paulding and Rose Hill around 835 PM CDT. Orange around 845 PM CDT. Stafford Springs around 850 PM CDT. Pachuta and Barnett around 855 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
